## ExpNode class

Computes the natural exponential function

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ExpNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns e^x (Euler's number raised to the power x). Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
